title: Please help me riot!!
body: seriously why TF do i need such high internet. you guys are NO help when it comes to ping problems. "it must be your fault" is all i get. but i have AWESOME internet and an AWESOME computer i spent a lot of money on JUST for league. But i cant fucking play.

replies.body: You don't necessarily need a high internet, but it should be stable enough to reach our services and safe from any blocks along the way.  Regardless of how amazing your internet is, you can run into bumps while reaching something like the game server.  I recommend going over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tighten up your network and remove any obstacles along the way.  This should get you back in game!
The ONLY game i want to play is League, i do not care about other games.
